review.title: “Pretty great place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Great Company Culture - they want you to have fun, even if execution sucksVery good product - lots of locally sourced food and beverageGood people to work for - they've got heart
review.cons: Cons – Poor compensation for management - they're stingyGrowing business struggling to find its identityred tape from upper management
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop handing out busy work to your GM's and let them attend to the business of running your business. Also pay your management team more.
